data.text:
Payroll Management

Managed Payroll

Critical Path Advisors makes payroll and tax processing easy. We take over as your dedicated payroll team, relieving you of the burden. We ensure payroll is processed quickly and accurately, while providing easy access to payroll information, anytime, anywhere so that your company has the visibility it requires.

System Agnostic

Our team possesses a wide breadth of expertise across virtually all platforms. We'll be able to provide our top-shelf service on whichever platform you're most comfortable with.

Set It and Forget It

Say goodbye to the burdens of payroll and tax processing. Rest easy knowing that your payroll is in the best hands possible.​​

"I've had the pleasure of working with Critical Path Advisors on numerous engagements related to Payroll and Compliance. I've found both their overall level of expertise and customer service to be second to none."

Debi Clyncke ( Global Payroll Manager, Amgen )

"Thank you so much for helping our employee with his questions. There is no way we would have ever gotten that kind of service from “you know who”. You’re the best!!."

Operations Manager, Film Studio

Benefits Administration

In years past, companies could get by picking their benefits from a chart without guidance. Critical Path Advisors knows that this approach falls far below the level needed to attract and retain quality talent. We spend time getting to know our clients so we can analyze their specific needs, craft a customized plan, implement our design, and deliver measurable outcomes.​ We also believe in the power of education, providing tailored materials so employees can fully understand the breadth of their benefits, as well as how to use them to their best advantage.
